titles.title: Amtrak Board Leadership Enhancement Act
To alter the composition and terms of the Board of Directors of Amtrak, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Railroads.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 11/18/2005--Introduced. Amtrak Board Leadership Enhancement Act - Amends federal transportation law to replace the Amtrak Reform Board with a reconstituted Board of Directors of Amtrak (effectively eliminating the Reform Board). Revises former requirements for the composition and terms of the Board of Directors. Allows members of the Amtrak Reform Board to continue to serve out their terms.
